'Peking University' (abbreviation: 'PKU' or colloquially known in Chinese as
'Beida' , BÄidÃ ), is a major research university located in Beijing, and a
member of the C9 League. It is the first established modern national university
of China, founded as the "Imperial University of Peking" in 1898 as a
replacement of the ancient Guozijian
(). [http://hi.baidu.com/yiyi/blog/item/ec385c60a0da9cde8db10d19.html Peking
University's Historical Importance. Baidu] By 1920 it had become a center
for progressive thought. Today, Peking University is frequently placed as one of
the best universities in China by many national and international rankings. [http://www.chinaeducenter.com/en/university.php
University in China]. China Education Center Ltd. [http://www.topuniversities.com/university-
rankings/world-university-rankings/ QS University Ranking] [http://www.timeshighereducation.co.uk/world-
university-rankings/ Times Higher Education] In addition to academics,
Peking University is especially renowned for its campus
grounds, and the beauty of its traditional Chinese archit-
ecture. [http://bschool.nus.edu.sg/NUSPKUMBA/AboutPekingUniversity/Overview-
/tabid/412/Default.aspx About Peking University.] National University of
Singapore

Throughout its history, the university has educated and hosted many prominent
modern Chinese thinkers, including figures such as: Lu Xun, Mao Zedong, Gu
Hongming, Hu Shih, Li Dazhao, and Chen Duxiu. [http://www.pku.edu.cn/about/about/beida/mingren.htm Peking
University - Mingren] Peking University was influential in the birth of
China's New Culture Movement, May Fourth Movement, the Tiananmen Square protest
of 1989 and many other significant events.
